journal-7.name: 7-Day Journal Streak
journal-7.description: Completed 7 consecutive days of journaling for mental health. This achievement represents dedication to self-reflection and emotional wellness.

journal-30.name: 30-Day Journal Streak
journal-30.description: Completed 30 consecutive days of journaling for mental health. This achievement represents exceptional commitment to daily self-reflection and emotional growth.

meditation-7.name: 7-Day Meditation Streak
meditation-7.description: Completed 7 consecutive days of meditation practice. This achievement represents dedication to mindfulness and mental wellness through daily meditation.

meditation-30.name: 30-Day Meditation Streak
meditation-30.description: Completed 30 consecutive days of meditation practice. This achievement represents exceptional commitment to mindfulness and mental wellness through sustained daily meditation.
